tiktok.title: Official TikTok App
tiktok.body:
TikTok is a global video community powered by music. Whether it’s dance, free-style or performance, creators are encouraged to let their imagination run wild and set their expressions free.

By pressing the button below, you will be redirected to a PayPal Payment Page where you can also use your Debit/Credit Card to pay. After payment, we will provide a direct download link to the Official TikTok App.

line.title: Official Line App
line.body:
LINE reshapes communication around the globe, allowing you to enjoy not only messaging but also free voice and video calls wherever you find yourself. Download LINE and discover the reasons for its global popularity and number one ranking in 52 countries.

By pressing the button below, you will be redirected to a PayPal Payment Page where you can also use your Debit/Credit Card to pay. After payment, we will provide a direct download link to the Official Line App.

whatsapp.title: Official WhatsApp App
whatsapp.body:
This is the only way to continue using WhatsApp for BlackBerry 10 devices. IT WORKS! IT IS FAST! IT IS RELIABLE! ALL BLACKBERRY 10 DEVICES ARE SUPPORTED - Passport, Z10, Z30, Q10, Q5, Classic.

WhatsApp Messenger is a FREE messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family. Switch from SMS to WhatsApp to send and receive messages, calls, photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages.

whatsappbusiness.title: Official WhatsApp Business App
whatsappbusiness.body:
WhatsUp10 is the only way to continue using WhatsApp for BlackBerry 10 devices. IT WORKS! IT IS FAST! IT IS RELIABLE! ALL BLACKBERRY 10 DEVICES ARE SUPPORTED - Passport, Z10, Z30, Q10, Q5, Classic.

WhatsApp Business enables you to have a business presence on WhatsApp, communicate more efficiently with your customers, and help you grow your business.

messenger.title: Official Messenger App
messenger.body:
Instantly connect with the people in your life.
- Official Facebook Messenger App
- Super Fast and Real-time Chat
- SEEN and TYPING indicator
- Headless Hub Integrated Notifications
- Send Photos + Videos + Audio + Stickers
- Spy/Read chats without SEEN
- Enable Dark Theme Mode
- Set App Color Schemes
- Set App Wallpapers
- Set Security Password Lock
- No ADS (Advertisements)
